api_list.name: Email verifier
api_list.description: This endpoint verifies the validity of an email address. It checks the email address format, domain, and whether it is a disposable email address. It then extracts the MX records from the domain's DNS records and connects to the email server via SMTP. The function also simulates sending a message to the email server to confirm that the mailbox associated with the email address actually exists.
